text: sunglineun hananimkke hoegaehaneunjaui geos-iyo gyeongbaehaneun jaui geos-i myeo gamsahago dansighaneun jaui geos-i myeo heoligubhyeo yebaehaneun jaui geos-i yo uimusahang-eul silcheonhago geumgihan geos-eul meollihaneun jaui geos-imyeo hana nim-ui beomjuleul jikineun ja geuligo sindodeul-ege gippeum-eul juneun jadeul-ui geos-inila
